redifi

redifi aims at helping small businesses thrive.

It is made of two very different components:

Redifi Menu is an online ordering system. Read more about what it is and who is it for, or head over to https://redifi.io get started.

Redifi Database is a lead generator and customer database builder. It's fit for event organisers, hospitality venues and any other business trying to create a connection with their guests. Check it out at https://redifi.net.
